Ok so I downloaded this, and Ive mounted it into Daemon Tools Lite (4.12.3) but I cannot seem to get anything to run?

I can open the files and look around but there doesn't seem to be any .exe files, just  a .pdf booklet, all in Dutch, what I can't understand much of.  I can see that it has phrases in, but there is no English translation.

Am I doing something wrong, or is this not what I thought it was?
Sorry...Just wanted to point out that maybe I didn't fully read the description, and thought this included the program... Opps!

Thank you for your share. Do you have its audio companion. or does someone know where I can download it?

Thanks a lot in advance!
I went to "add a new language" and it asked me to update. I already have V3. This is the only one I've had a problem with.

This torrent is working absolutely FINE.

If you have not mounted the ISO then  you cant do it, better use Dameon Lite to mount it,
 dont use winrar to unzip ? :( some do, 
Also Please dont accuse the uploader without trying all the options.

I can open the files and look around but there doesn't seem to be any .exe files, just a .pdf booklet, all in Dutch, what I can't understand much of. I can see that it has phrases in, but there is no English translation.

Am I doing something wrong, or is this not what I thought it was?

For everyone asking, this is the language file pack only. You also need to download & install the Rosetta Stone software itself:
Rosetta Stone V3.4.7
Link http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5852393/Rosetta_Stone_3.4.7___Crack(VasiaZozulia)

If you follow the instructions, it works. I can confirm. Follow them exactly.

For the record, if you're having problems getting the program to acknowledge these data files Dae-mon-tool-s has an option to add an s.c.s.i. virtual drive. Add one, mount the ISO to that virtual drive instead of the default DT drive. Solved my issue.
